# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection, and given its quality, it's worth more than $100. Considering its true value, I am offering it to you for $120. This is an opportunity to get a high-quality item at a price that's slightly above its perceived value by you, ensuring both of us benefit. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
